title: Tender for the Supply of 120,000 Vials of Dried Factor VIII Fraction BP 250 - 300 IU
decision_details: -  the proposal made by Hon. Maithripala Sirisena, Minister of Health for the purchase of six (06) month's  requirement of the above item (20,000 vials) for a total cost of US$ 1,217,400.00 (LKR 161,188,506,00) and to call for quotations for the balance quantity, as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
